title: Combi stroller katy
text: Originally Posted On: SpreadMyAd Additional Comments: For sale a combi Cosmo stroller. Attractive condition. Very light weight, and easy to use. Asking $45 About this item Just 3 quick steps are all it takes to fold the lightweight Combi Cosmo into a compact, self-standing, portable stroller. The "quick fold" makes folding, packing, and carrying your Cosmo around a cinch. The stroller accepts the Combi Shuttle infant car seats for use as a travel system. The deluxe, padded seat features a multi-position recline with a full lay-flat position and an infant safety boot. A convertible three- or five-point harness grows with your child and the removable, padded guardrail features a cup holder and snack tray. The lockable, front swivel wheels allow for smooth rides and excellent maneuverability. A parent cup holder, large basket and canopy pocket offers convenient storage of essential items. The convenient carry strap keeps your hands free while transporting your Cosmo on-the-go.
